name: solidity
description: Preset optimized for Solidity smart contract auditing
security_focus: Identify the most critical contracts for security review. Focus on: value transfer logic, access control mechanisms, state mutations, external calls, token operations, and privileged functions. Prioritize core protocol contracts over peripherals. Pay special attention to contracts handling funds or admin privileges.

required: Value flow graph tracking ETH/token movements through the protocol, showing all paths funds can take including deposits, withdrawals, transfers, and fee collection
Access control graph mapping roles, permissions, and privileged functions, showing who can call what and under which conditions
State mutation graph showing all state-changing operations, their ordering constraints, and potential race conditions
